class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.SpecimenKit
class.sql-query: select kit.identifier as kitId, count(distinct(cpr.identifier)) as participantCnt, count(distinct(spmn.identifier)) as specimenCnt from os_specimen_kits kit inner join os_kit_specimens ks on ks.kit_id = kit.identifier inner join catissue_specimen spmn on spmn.identifier = ks.specimen_id inner join catissue_specimen_coll_group visit on visit.identifier = spmn.specimen_collection_group_id inner join catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr on cpr.identifier = visit.collection_protocol_reg_id where kit.identifier in (:kitIds) and kit.activity_status != 'Disabled' and spmn.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by kit.identifier
